svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Aid received per capita vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Total official development assistance received per person versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita. Total
assistance is the sum of country programmable aid (CPA), humanitarian and food aid, measured in constant 2016
USD per person. GDP per capita is measured in 2011 international-$.
Source: OECD (2018), World Bank â€“ WDI
